001package net.tnemc.core.io.storage.datables.sql.standard;

020
021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.CurrencyHoldings;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.RegionHoldings;
027import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
028import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.TNEDialect;
029import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.SQLConnector;
035import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
036import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
037
038import java.sql.ResultSet;
039import java.sql.SQLException;
040import java.util.ArrayList;
041import java.util.Collection;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Optional;
044import java.util.UUID;
045
046/**
047 * SQLHoldings
048 *
049 * @author creatorfromhell
050 * @since 0.1.2.0
051 */
052public class SQLHoldings implements Datable<HoldingsEntry> {
053
054  /**
055   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
056   *
057   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
058   */
059  @Override
060  public Class<? extends HoldingsEntry> clazz() {
061
062    return HoldingsEntry.class;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
067   *
068   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
069   */
070  @Override
071  public void purge(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
072    //This isn't required, it'll be deleted with the account.
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Used to store this object.
077   *
078   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
079   * @param object    The object to be stored.
080   */
081  @Override
082  public void store(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final HoldingsEntry object, @Nullable final String identifier) {
083
084    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne && identifier != null) {
085
086      PluginCore.log().debug("Storing holdings for Identifier: " + identifier);
087
088      sql.executeUpdate(tne.saveHoldings(),
089                        new Object[]{
090                                identifier,
091                                MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name"),
092                                object.getRegion(),
093                                object.getCurrency().toString(),
094                                object.getHandler().asID(),
095                                object.getAmount(),
096                                object.getAmount()
097                        });
098    }
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Used to store all objects of this type.
103   *
104   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
105   */
106  @Override
107  public void storeAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
108
109    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && identifier != null) {
110
111      final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(identifier);
112      if(account.isPresent()) {
113
114
115        for(final Map.Entry<String, RegionHoldings> region : account.get().getWallet().getHoldings().entrySet()) {
116          for(final Map.Entry<UUID, CurrencyHoldings> currency : region.getValue().getHoldings().entrySet()) {
117            for(final HoldingsEntry entry : account.get().getHoldings(region.getKey(), currency.getKey())) {
118              store(connector, entry, identifier);
119            }
120          }
121        }
122      }
123
124    }
125  }
126
127  /**
128   * Used to load this object.
129   *
130   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
131   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
132   *
133   * @return The object to load.
134   *
135   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException as this method is not valid for holdings.
136   */
137  @Override
138  public Optional<HoldingsEntry> load(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier) {
139
140    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("load for HoldingsEntry is not a supported operation.");
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Used to load all objects of this type.
145   *
146   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
147   *
148   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
149   */
150  @Override
151  public Collection<HoldingsEntry> loadAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
152
153    final Collection<HoldingsEntry> holdings = new ArrayList<>();
154
155    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne && identifier != null) {
156      PluginCore.log().debug("SQLHoldings-loadAll-Account ID:" + identifier, DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
157      try(final ResultSet result = sql.executeQuery(tne.loadHoldings(),
158                                                    new Object[]{
159                                                      identifier,
160                                                      MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name")
161                                              })) {
162        while(result.next()) {
163
164          final String currency = result.getString("currency");
165
166          if(TNECore.eco().currency().find(currency).isEmpty()) {
167            EconomyManager.invalidCurrencies().add(currency);
168          }
169
170          //region, currency, amount, type
171          final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(result.getString("region"),
172                                                        UUID.fromString(currency),
173                                                        result.getBigDecimal("holdings"),
174                                                        Identifier.fromID(result.getString("holdings_type")));
175
176          PluginCore.log().debug("SQLHoldings-loadAll-Entry ID:" + entry.getHandler(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
177          PluginCore.log().debug("SQLHoldings-loadAll-Entry AMT:" + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
178          holdings.add(entry);
179        }
180      } catch(final SQLException e) {
181        e.printStackTrace();
182      }
183    }
184    return holdings;
185  }
186}
